name: Summon Steward
description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

name: Purify Soul
description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

name: Soulshape
description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

name: Flicker
description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

name: Fleshcraft
description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

name: Door of Shadows
description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

name: Scouring Tithe
description: Deal (100% of Spell power) Arcane damage instantly, and (144% of Spell power) over 18 sec. If the enemy dies while affected by Scouring Tithe, you generate 5 Soul Shard. If they survive, Scouring Tithe's cooldown is refreshed.

name: Soul Rot
description:
Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 3 additional targets nearby, causing them to suffer (100% of Spell power) Nature damage over 8 sec.

For the next 8 sec, casting Drain Life will cause you to also Drain Life from any enemy affected by your Soul Rot, and Drain Life will not consume any mana.

Consumes 20% of maximum health when cast.

name: Decimating Bolt
description:
Hurl bolts of decimating magic at your target, dealing [4 * (50% of Spell power)] Shadow damage and increasing the damage of your next 3 

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerates</dynamic>

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Souls</dynamic>

Shadow Bolts by 200%.

Decimating Bolt's damage, and the bonus to 

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerate</dynamic>

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Soul</dynamic>

Shadow Bolt both increase as your target's health decreases.

name: Impending Catastrophe
description: Call forth a cloud of chaotic anima that travels to the target enemy, dealing (100% of Spell power) Shadow damage to enemies in its path. When the anima reaches the target it explodes, inflicting either Curse of Weakness or Curse of Tongues, and dealing (261% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies.
